result.reason: WebDAV CAS error was a .NET Framework issue likely resolved by .NET 10 migration; reporter has not retested after our 2026-02-07 triage refresh request
result.approach: Wait for reporter to retest on v1.81.0+ (.NET 10). If confirmed fixed, close. If still failing, investigate WebDAV-specific path handling or Windows zone restrictions.

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is from 2019 â€” user tried running mRemoteNG portable from a WebDAV drive and got a .NET Framework CAS (Code Access Security) zone error. This was a classic .NET Framework trust-level issue for network-mounted executables. Since mRemoteNG has migrated to .NET 10 (where CAS doesn't exist), this is likely already resolved. We already posted a triage refresh comment in Feb 2026 with no response.
